00001 #ifndef FM_KWAY_GAIN_ARRAY_HPP
00002 #define FM_KWAY_GAIN_ARRAY_HPP
00003 
00004 #ifndef FM_MOVE_INFO_HPP
00005 #include "FMMoveInfo.hpp"
00006 #endif
00007 
00008 #include <vector>
00009 
00073 class FMKWayGainArray
00074 {
00075 public:
00077   FMKWayGainArray(std::vector<short>* gain, unsigned int K) : 
00078     _gain(gain), _K(K) 
00079   {
00080   }
00081 
00082 
00085   void updateMove(const FMMoveInfo& moveInfo,
00086                   const short* deltaGain) 
00087   {
00088     const unsigned int i_v = moveInfo._i_v;
00089     const unsigned int fromPart = moveInfo._fromPart;
00090     const unsigned int toPart = moveInfo._toPart;
00091     for (unsigned int k=0; k<getNumPartitions(); ++k) {
00092       if (k == fromPart || k == toPart) continue;
00093       _gain[k][i_v] += deltaGain[k];
00094     }
00095     _gain[fromPart][i_v] = -_gain[toPart][i_v];
00096     _gain[toPart][i_v] = 0; // ???
00097   }
00098 
00099 
00101   void updateNeighbor(unsigned int whichPart,  
00102                       unsigned int i_w,  
00103                       const short* deltaGain)   
00104   {
00105     for (unsigned int k=0; k<getNumPartitions(); ++k) {
00106       if (k == whichPart) continue;
00107       _gain[k][i_w] += deltaGain[k]; 
00108     }
00109   }
00110 
00111 private:
00113   unsigned int getNumPartitions() const { return _K; }
00114 
00115 
00116 private:
00117   std::vector<short>* _gain; 
00118   unsigned int _K;           
00119 };
00120 
00122 #endif
